name: batuara-frontend
description: Frontend projects for Casa de Caridade Batuara

scripts.install:all: cd PublicWebsite && npm install && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm install
scripts.start:admin: cd AdminDashboard && set PORT=3001 && npm start
scripts.start:all: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run start:public" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build:all: cd PublicWebsite && npm run build && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd PublicWebsite && npm test && cd ../AdminDashboard && npm test

author: Casa de Caridade Batuara
